Articles.Content: First of all a big congratulations iv already had a few memorable moments in the game some bodies have great textures/views I can picture mass outposts on Bop, Ships coming in low over the crater mountains for landing in the crater(yes I did try land there!) nothing though sets the atmosphere better than the audio music's for each body Mun and Duna are epic , so I decided to visit  all bodies to listen..only to find most just have a generic beat. Each body having a unique sound is something that should have been in from day one as it is adding so much to the atmosphere and character of the body  . The music is the reason I visited the planets again . I think the texture on Val definitely needs some work too. Overall I can see where the games going and I'm liking the direction ,keep up the good work
I would like to be able to insert the music of my choice in the game.  Docking always makes me hear Space Odyssey 2001, would love to be able to toggle that on in-game.
